creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: unsigned; keyblock impression for print (L2001.372.44); woman in kimono with butterflies, applying pigment to her lips with a small brush; woman holds a rectangular mirror in her PL hand; thin, vellum-like sheet adheared to thicker sheet
inscription: 地墨、ツヤ墨、緑、藍、代赭、紅、黄、ウス藍、ニク、雲母 {Jizumi, tsuyazumi, midori, ai, taisha, beni, ki, usu ai, niku, unmo} (Base black, glossy black, green, blue, red ochre, crimson, yellow, light blue, skin color, mica)
markings: LRC: red artist\'s seal of deer figure
text: Portrait of Chiyofuku 千代福, a maiko of Gion, Kyoto.
title: Keyblock impression for "Woman Holding a Lip Brush"
